mapper.select: SELECT COMPANY COMPANY, ITNBR ITNBR, NAME ITDSC, SPEC1 ISPEC1, UNMSR UNMSR, JIJIC JIJIC, (SELECT NAME1 FROM SAA01_MST WHERE CODE = A.IFORM AND SYS_CD = 'S' AND GROUP_CD = 'Y6' AND CODE <> '*' AND SUBSTR(CODE, 1,1) = 'A' AND USE = 'Y') IFORM_NM, (SELECT NAME1 FROM SAA01_MST WHERE SYS_CD = 'P' AND GROUP_CD = 'D0' AND CODE <> '*' AND USE = 'Y' AND A.UNMSR = CODE) UNMSR_NM FROM SALE.SAB01_MST A WHERE COMPANY = #{company_cd} AND A.ITNBR LIKE #{itnbr}||'%' AND A.NAME LIKE '%'||#{itnbr_nm}||'%' AND NVL(A.SPEC1,'%') LIKE '%'||#{spec1}||'%' AND NVL(A.JIJIC,'%') LIKE '%'||#{jijic}||'%' AND NVL(A.IFORM,'%') LIKE '%'||#{iform}||'%' AND A.SEC_CASTRATE <> 'Y' ORDER BY ITNBR, IFORM

SELECT BY_CD, BY_NM, SUBSTR(BU_CD, 1, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(BU_CD, 4, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(BU_CD, 6,5) BU_CD, BY_PRSN, VEN_USER, BY_TEL_NO, BY_ADDR FROM ACNT.SAA_BUYER WHERE BY_CD IS NOT NULL
and by_cd like #{by_cd} || '%'
and nvl(by_nm, '%') like '%' || #{by_nm} || '%'
and bu_cd like #{bu_cd} || '%'
and nvl(by_prsn, '%') like '%' || #{by_prsn} || '%'
and nvl(ven_user, '%') like '%' || #{ven_user} || '%'
and nvl(by_tel_no, '%') like '%' || #{by_tel_no} || '%'
and use_gubun in ('1', '2')
and use_gubun in ('1')
SELECT SOSOK DEPT_CD, NAME DEPT_NAME FROM COMMON.WAA10_MST WHERE SOSOK <> '*******' ORDER BY SOSOK ASC

SELECT A.PJTNO, A.PJTNM, B.CURSTS, A.BALJU, A.SOCMA, A.ITGRP1, A.SOCDT, A.ITGRP FROM SCA01_MST A, SCA01_DTL B WHERE A.COMPANY = B.COMPANY AND A.PLANT = B.PLANT AND A.PJTNO = B.PJTNO AND A.COMPANY = #{company_cd} AND A.SORCD BETWEEN REPLACE(substr(#{date1}, 1, 10), '-', '') AND REPLACE(substr(#{date2}, 1, 10), '-', '')
AND A.PJTNO LIKE '%'||#{pjtno}||'%'
AND A.PJTNM LIKE '%'||#{pjtnm}||'%'
AND (A.SOCMA = #{user} OR #{user} = '*')
AND (B.CURSTS = #{status} OR #{status} = '*')
AND (A.BALJU = #{balju} OR #{balju} = '*')
ORDER BY SUBSTR(A.PJTNO,3,6) DESC , A.SORCD

SELECT PJTNO, PJTNM, TO_CHAR(POJIT, 'yyyy-mm-dd') POJIT, SUNAM, PROD.SF_BUYER_NM(SUNAM) SNAME, BANAM, PROD.SF_BUYER_NM(BANAM) BNAME, CVCOD, ITGRP, SOFNO, TO_CHAR(SODAT, 'yyyy-mm-dd') SODAT FROM SALE.SCA09_MST WHERE COMPANY = #{company_cd} AND PLANT = #{plant_cd} AND TO_DATE(SODAT) BETWEEN REPLACE(substr(#{date1}, 1, 10), '-', '') AND REPLACE(substr(#{date2}, 1, 10), '-', '')
AND PJTNO >= #{pjtcd}
AND PJTNM LIKE '%'||#{pjtnm}||'%'
ORDER BY SUBSTR(PJTNO,3,6) DESC

SELECT PDTNO, DRSEQ, CONF_DATE, SODAT, SF_PJTNO_DATA(COMPANY, PLANT, SUBSTR(PDTNO,1,8), '1') PJTNO_NM, DRDSC FROM PAE03_HIS WHERE COMPANY = #{company_cd} AND PLANT = #{plant_cd} AND CONF_DATE IS NOT NULL AND CONF_DATE BETWEEN REPLACE(substr(#{pjtno_fr}, 1, 10), '-', '') AND REPLACE(substr(#{pjtno_to}, 1, 10), '-', '') ORDER BY SUBSTR(PDTNO,3,6) DESC, DRSEQ

SELECT A.COMPANY, A.PDTNO, A.DRSEQ, SF_PJTNO_DATA(A.COMPANY, A.PLANT, SUBSTR(A.PDTNO,1,8), '1') PJTNO_NM, SF_DRSEQ_DRDSC(A.COMPANY, A.PLANT, SUBSTR(A.PDTNO,1,9), A.DRSEQ) DRDSC, A.PUR_NO, A.PLANT, A.SUPL_CLASS, A.VENDOR VENDOR_NAME, A.PUR_STATUS, A.DELV_PLANT, A.DELV_DATE, A.PLAN_YM, TO_CHAR(A.PUR_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') PUR_DATE FROM PDA04_MST A WHERE A.COMPANY = #{company_cd} AND A.PLANT = #{plant_cd} AND A.PUR_TYPE IN ('01', '03') AND A.PUR_STATUS IN ('01', '03', '05', '07') ORDER BY A.PUR_NO DESC
